select.selectitems: sphere ellipsoid block right_angular_wedge faceted_primitive rectangular_pyramid torus right_circular_cone eccentric_cone right_circular_cylinder cyclide_segment_solid bounded_primitive_2d

entity.name: solid_model
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (csg_solid, manifold_solid_brep, swept_face_solid, swept_area_solid, swept_disk_solid, solid_replica, brep_2d, trimmed_volume)

where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (elp_fbnds <* QUERY (bnds <* extent.bounds | 'TOPOLOGY_SCHEMA.EDGE_LOOP' IN TYPEOF(bnds.bound)) | NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (oe <* elp_fbnds.bound\path.edge_list | NOT (('TOPOLOGY_SCHEMA.EDGE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(oe.edge_element)) AND (oe.edge_element\geometric_representation_item.dim = 2)))) = 0))) = 0
where.label: WR4

where.expression: same_side([points[1], points[2], points[3]], [points[5], points[6], points[7], points[8]])
where.label: WR8

where.expression: same_side([points[1], points[4], points[8]], [points[3], points[7], points[6], points[2]])
where.label: WR9

where.expression: same_side([points[1], points[2], points[5]], [points[3], points[7], points[8], points[4]])
where.label: WR10

where.expression: same_side([points[5], points[6], points[7]], [points[1], points[2], points[3], points[4]])
where.label: WR11

where.expression: same_side([points[3], points[7], points[6]], [points[1], points[4], points[8], points[5]])
where.label: WR12

where.expression: same_side([points[3], points[7], points[8]], [points[1], points[5], points[6], points[2]])
where.label: WR13

derived.expression: representation_item('')|| geometric_representation_item()|| curve()|| line(axis.location, representation_item('')|| geometric_representation_item()|| vector(axis.z, 1.0))
derived.name: axis_line

derived.expression: representation_item('')|| geometric_representation_item()|| curve()|| line(axis.location, representation_item('')|| geometric_representation_item()|| vector(axis.z, 1.0))
derived.name: axis_line

entity.name: tessellated_item
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (coordinates_list, tessellated_solid, tessellated_shell, tessellated_wire, tessellated_geometric_set, tessellated_curve_set, tessellated_point_set, tessellated_surface_set, tessellated_structured_item)

function.name: acyclic_set_replica
acyclic_solid_replica
build_transformed_set
constraints_geometry_shell_based_surface_model
constraints_geometry_shell_based_wireframe_model
msb_shells
